## write() function

Replaces asynchronously any existing tags with the given tags in the given buffer or specified file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function write(tags: WriteTags, filebuffer: string | Buffer, callback: WriteCallback): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tags | [WriteTags](./node-id3.writetags.md) |  |
|  filebuffer | string \| Buffer |  |
|  callback | [WriteCallback](./node-id3.writecallback.md) |  |

**Returns:**

void
